What I'm Learning

One of the first lessons I was taught on this journey is that you're always learning. This is true for everything listed below. I may be proficient, but I'll never stop seeking more.

HTML 5

The skeleton of a web page. This is newbie stuff 101, but I still take my time with it (just in case). See more in the projects section!

CSS 3

Let's be honest, most of us found true frustrations in CSS. It's worth noting that I'm familiar and proficient in using SASS, and I'm well versed in Materialize and Bootstrap as well. Check out more in the projects section of this site!

javaScript

It's my personal opinion that true strength resides in vanilla javaScript, which is why my main focus (along side React) has been here. You can find some of my projects with javaScript in the projects section of this site!

React

At the time of developing this portfolio, React (along side vanilla JS) has been my main focal point. You can find some of my projects with react in the projects section of this site!
